constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 104 (Tuesday, June 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. RODGERS of Washington:
H.R. 3917.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clauses 1 and 18 of the
U.S. Constitution, which provide as follows:
The Congress shall have Power To lay and collect Taxes,
Duties, Imposts and Excises, to pay the Debts and provide
for the common Defense and general Welfare of the United
States;
[Page H2817]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

title: Making Aid for Local Disasters Equal Now Act
